cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on September 30, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5102, Flights for Freedom Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 150 (Tuesday, August 24, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. TENNEY:
H.R. 5102.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority upon which this bill rests is
the power of Congress to make appropriations that place a
condition on an expenditure, as enumerated in Article I,
Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H4489]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: Flights for Freedom Act
